item.description:
Hello fellow members, I would like to set up my first meetup event with the help of Tamami!

My company Love & Conviction is hosting a 20-minute fashion show at Club Pearl this weekend. I invite you all to come.
For all of you that have been to Japan, or havnt. I invite you all to travel to Downtown Tokyo this Saturday at Club Pearl.
I can get you guys a reduced rate if you leave me your full name and the number of guests you will be bringing.
I hope to meet you all at the show. I hope I can share with you the beauty of Japanese fashion today.
We will have Japanese Sexy Glam style and Japanese Street Fashion as pieces for the night.
Everyone that RSVP in this I'll put on the guestlist but I need to know how many people will be with you, so you all can get the discount. It'll be 10 dollars for guestlist, 20 dollars for regular pricing.

Thank you and hope to see you all there!

Philip Lee
www.loveandconviction.com
item.name: Japanese Sexy Glam Fashion Show - Love and Conviction
